auth.noAuthTokenMessage: Igihe cyawe cyo kwinjira cyarangiye cyangwa ntikiriho. Nyamuneka ongera usinye kugirango ukomeze.
auth.sessionExpiredMessage: Igihe cyo Kwinjira Cyarangiye. Nyamuneka ongera winjire.
auth.initialLoadError: Kunanirwa kureba amakuru y'ukoresha. Nyamuneka ongera usinye.
auth.forgotPasswordPrompt: Andika imeri yawe kugirango ubonere link yo guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga.
auth.resetLinkSentSuccess: Link yo guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga yoherejwe kuri imeri yawe!
auth.resetLinkSentError: Kunanirwa kohereza link yo guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga. Nyamuneka reba imeri yawe cyangwa ongera ugerageze nyuma.
auth.passwordUpdateError: Kunanirwa guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

home.noDemandFound: Nta makuru y'ibicuruzwa aboneka mu gace kawe.
home.myYieldTrendPlotTitle: Imiterere y'Umusaruro Wanjye mu Bihe Bitandukanye
home.myYieldTrendDescription: Iki gishushanyo cyerekana uko umusaruro wawe wagenze mu bihe byashize ku bihingwa by'ingenzi, bikagufasha kumenya aho bigana n'aho ushobora kuzamura.
home.myYieldTrendInsight: Kanda hano ubone isesengura ryimbitse ry'umusaruro.
home.generalYieldTrendDescription: Iki gishushanyo cyerekana imyaka y'umusaruro rusange mu turere ku bihingwa bizwi. Gitanga igipimo cyo kugereranya imikorere y'ubuhinzi bwawe n'ibipimo rusange.
home.generalYieldTrendInsight: Reba amakuru rusange y'umusaruro kugirango uhitemo ibihingwa byiza n'uburyo bwo kubicunga.
home.myDemandForecastDescription: Iki gishushanyo cyerekana imiterere y'ibyifuzo by'isoko ry'akarere ku bihingwa bizwi mu isoko ryawe ry'ibanze. Kigufasha kumva impinduka z'isoko zijyanye n'akarere kawe.
home.myDemandForecastInsight: Sesengura ibyifuzo by'akarere kugirango uhitemo igihe cyo gutera no kugurisha kugirango ubonere ibiciro byiza.
home.generalDemandForecastDescription: Iki gishushanyo cyerekana imiterere rusange y'ibyifuzo by'isoko mu turere dutandukanye. Gitanga ubumenyi bwagutse ku mikorere y'ibyifuzo by'ibihingwa kirenze akarere kawe.
home.generalDemandForecastInsight: Reba isesengura ryimbitse ry'isoko kugirango uteganye impinduka z'isoko zigari kandi ufate ibyemezo by'ingirakamaro.
home.noYieldData: Nta makuru y'umusaruro wawe aboneka. Andika ibisarurwa byawe kugirango ubone imiterere.
home.noDemandData: Nta makuru y'imiterere y'ibyifuzo by'akarere aboneka. Ongera ugerageze nyuma.
home.noGeneralYieldData: Nta makuru rusange y'imiterere y'umusaruro aboneka. Gerageza guhitamo ikindi gihingwa cyangwa akarere.
home.noGeneralDemandData: Nta makuru rusange y'imiterere y'ibyifuzo aboneka. Gerageza guhitamo ahande hantu cyangwa ikindi gihingwa.
home.recordHarvestSubtitle: Andika amakuru arambuye y'ibisarurwa byawe byarangiye
